headline: AGOHP Capital's Chris Agohp Quietly Builds a Global Hospitality Portfolio From Undervalued Hotel Assets

headline: Wellness Tourism Market Insights Report 2025-2030 with Exclusive Data on 40+ Vendors Including Accor, Hilton Worldwide, Hyatt Hotels, Marriott International, and Radisson Hotel
summary: The global wellness tourism market, valued at USD 954.11 billion in 2024, is projected to skyrocket to USD 1.68 trillion by 2030, at a CAGR of 9.90%. Key trends include a shift towards nature-based eco-wellness travel and personalized wellness experiences. North America dominates, holding 42% of the market, while the APAC region is the fastest-grower at a 13.32% CAGR. The lodging segment leads with over 23% market share. Major players like Accor S.A., Hilton, and Marriott are innovating in this
